answerText: Vlasov equation[10] Alfvén's theorem states that the lines of this field follow the motion of the plasma, which is why it is sometimes called the flux-freezing theorem. This field is perpendicular to the electric field in propagating light waves.
heading: SUBMIT |2014 | Editors 2 | 16 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] Name this equation which describes the time evolution of a plasma's velocity distribution.
